sentences.english: Pay attention to the marks of the bee wax and pick out the wrong or indistinct ones.
sentences.chinese: 注意蜂蜡上的标志，挑出错误和不清楚的。

sentences.english: She gathered up the moss and the remains of the beeswax.
sentences.chinese: 她把苔藓和剩下的蜂蜡收集在一起。

sentences.english: In Shanghai, where to buy beeswax candles?
sentences.chinese: 在上海，哪里能买到蜂蜡蜡烛？

sentences.english: The Beeswax candle said arrogantly as if she was the hostess of the party.
sentences.chinese: 蜂蜡蜡烛傲慢地说，就好像她已经是晚会的主人。

sentences.english: Other Ingredients: Vegetable Oil, Gelatin, Glycerin, Yellow Beeswax, Soy Lecithin.
sentences.chinese: 动物油，明胶，甘油，黄蜂蜡，大豆卵磷脂。

sentences.english: The hive is full of beeswax.
Do they eat the wax produced by the scale?
sentences.chinese: 难道它们吃白蜡虫产的蜂蜡？

sentences.english: Beeswax acts as an emulsifying agent.
sentences.chinese: 蜂蜡起到乳化剂的作用。

sentences.english: Can beeswax be used in cosmetic?
He impressed his seal on the wax.
sentences.chinese: 他在蜂蜡上盖了他的印章。

sentences.english: High quality furniture beeswax is easily available in the market.
sentences.chinese: 高品质的家具蜂蜡在市场上非常受欢迎。

sentences.english: The essence of the wax is extracted by the aid of alcohol.
sentences.chinese: 再借由酒精的帮助萃取出蜂蜡的精华。
